name: Hello World workflow

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  hello:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - name: Hello World
        run: echo "Hello World"

  goodbye:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Goodbye
        run: echo "Goodbye"
